column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here for dinner and had an amazing experience. We had garlic shrimp
column7: spicy potatoes (and a few other things I can't remember). Everything tasted incredible
column8: and the portions were perfect. It's easy to eat without being overly full
column9: but if you want to be really full that is also very possible. We saw another table order paella and regretted not getting it after we saw it. They mix it at the table for you and it smelled really good.
